job.title: Data Scientist (Reporting & Insights)
job.description: <p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>The Data &amp; Analytics team provides consumer research, data reporting, and advanced analytics to understand how consumers interact with our video content &amp; other products. This role will focus primarily on reporting and insight generation.</p><ul><li>Apply quantitative expertise ranging from data visualization to advanced statistical models</li><li>Support the analytics needs of clients across the following areas:</li><li>Data Sourcing &amp; Warehousing</li><li>Data Cleaning &amp; Preparation</li><li>Exploratory Analysis </li><li>Visualizations &amp; Monitoring Key Metrics</li><li>Statistical Analysis</li><li>Insight generation</li><li>Assist with the creation of deliverables (e.g. presentations) and messaging to business stakeholders</li><li>Ensure the quality and timeliness of analytic deliverables meet client's expectations</li><li>Contribute and build upon best practices and detailed documentation</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Qualifications/Requirements</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Bachelor’s in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, or related technical field</li><li>3+ years of work experience in Business Intelligence, Analytics, or Data Science space</li><li>Proficient in Python and databases (e.g., SQL, Mongo, etc.)</li><li>Experience with Tableau or similar visualization tool</li><li>Knowledge of statistics and data mining techniques (e.g., Hypothesis testing, regression modeling)</li><li>Proficient in MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Desired Characteristics</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Ability to develop clear and concise thoughts into recommendations and findings</li><li>Demonstrated verbal and written communication skills including effective visual representation of complex data</li><li>Experience communicating results of analyses to leadership teams</li><li>Prior experience in content, digital media, and/or technology</li></ul><p></p>
